item.title: Kafka Streams : Introduction
item.description: Stream is unbound flow of data (call it message, event or log). The Streams API of Apache KafkaÂ®, available through a Java library, can be used to build highly scalable, elastic, fault-tolerant, distributed applications and microservices. First and foremost, the Kafka Streams API allows you to create real-time applications that power your core business. It is the easiest yet the most powerful technology to process data stored in Kafka.
